summary.span: 表示圖例項目中的圖例資料格。

span.span: Represents a legend cell in a legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 圖例會填入圖例項目，由。A legend is populated with legend items, which are represented by the . 這些圖例項目組成個別的圖例資料格，接著由。These legend items consist of individual legend cells, which are in turn represented by the .

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the legend cell.

value.span: 值，用於繪製圖例資料格的背景。

span.span: A value used to draw the legend cell's background.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定圖例中的任何實體的背景色彩時，屬性會具有最高優先權。The property has the highest priority when setting the background color of any entity in the legend.

summary.span: 取得或設定用於繪製圖例資料格內容的水平資料格數量。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of horizontal cells used to draw the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 值，表示用於繪製圖例資料格內容的水平資料格數量。

span.span: An value that represents the number of horizontal cells used to draw the legend cell contents.

value.span: 預設值為 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果儲存格的內容必須超過的儲存格的寬度，您可以設定屬性設成內容所需的資料格數目。If the cell contents must extend beyond the cell width, you can set the property to the number of cells required to fit the contents. 如果您想要新增延伸的標頭或圖例的標題，最常使用這個屬性。This property is most often used if you wish to add an extended header or title to the legend. 當這個屬性設定為值大於 1 時，必須加入空的圖例資料格以容納擴充的圖例資料格的內容。When this property is set to a value larger than 1, empty legend cells must be added in order to accommodate the contents of the extended legend cell.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the legend cell type.

value.span: 列舉值，表示該類型會用來定義圖例資料格的內容。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the type that will be used to define the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定將會顯示在每個個別的圖例資料格的內容類型。The property determines the type of content that will be displayed in each individual legend cell. 必須指定其中一個下列的資料格類型：One of the following cell types must be specified: - 文字：使用指定的字串屬性，並會顯示在圖例資料格。Text: A string is specified using the property, and will be displayed in the legend cell. - 在 [seriessymbol]:數列符號由定義屬性中的類別。SeriesSymbol: A series symbol is defined by the property in the class. 它會顯示圖例資料格。It will be displayed for the legend cell. 請記住數列符號是視覺指標-線條、 矩形或標記。Recall that a series symbol is a visual indicator - a line, rectangle or marker. 當設為，所有的標記屬性的自訂項目套用至資料格。When is set to , all marker attributes of the custom item apply to the cell. - 映像：使用來定義影像屬性將會顯示在圖例資料格。Image: An image is defined using the property and will be displayed in the legend cell.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格的字型。

span.span: Gets or sets the font for the legend cell.

value.span: 物件，表示圖例資料格的字型。

span.span: A object that represents the font for the legend cell.

value.span: 預設值為 "Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt"。

span.span: The default value is "Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可用來設定圖例資料格的字型屬性。The property can be used to set font properties of the legend cell. 如果您嘗試變更這個屬性物件在執行階段，就會發生編譯錯誤。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在執行階段設定字型屬性，您必須建立新物件。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格的對應區域屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the map area attributes of the legend cell.

value.span: 值，表示圖例資料格對應區域的屬性。

span.span: A value that represents the attributes of the legend cell's corresponding map area.

value.span: 預設值為零長度字串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將設定屬性，將會自動建立用戶端影像地圖。If you set the property, a client-side image map will automatically be created. 對應區域也會建立，附加至其屬性字串\<對應 > 對應至相關的圖例資料格的標記。A map area will also be created, with its attribute string appended to the \ tag that corresponds to the relevant legend cell. 屬性可以用於搭配屬性來指定對應區域屬性，例如，目標 = _blank，作為用戶端事件處理常式，比方說，OnClick="MyEvent()"。The property can be used in conjunction with the property to specify map area attributes, for example, target= _blank, as well as client-side event handlers, for example, OnClick="MyEvent()". 設定這個屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性設定為`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 預設值為 `true`。The default value is `true`. 如果屬性設定為一系列與該數列的資料點時，資料點屬性的優先順序。If the property is set for both a series and a data point of that series, the data point property has precedence. 可能會使用特殊的關鍵字，當設定這個屬性，以及某種類型的資料適用的圖表項目將會取代每個關鍵字。Special keywords may be used when setting this property, and each keyword will be replaced with some type of data from the applicable chart element.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格的邊界。

span.span: Gets or sets the margins of the legend cell.

value.span: 物件，表示圖例資料格之上、下、左、右邊界的值。

span.span: A object that represents the top, bottom, left, and right values of the legend cell margins.

value.span: 上、下、左和右的預設值為 "0,0,15,15"。

span.span: The default values for top, bottom, left and right are "0,0,15,15".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 邊界會以百分比表示的圖例資料格的字型大小。Margins are measured as a percentage of the font size for the legend cell.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格中顯示之數列符號的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the series symbol that is displayed in the legend cell.

value.span: 物件，以圖例字型大小的分百比，表示數列符號的大小。

span.span: A object that represents the size of the series symbol as a percentage of the legend font size.

value.span: 符號的寬度和高度預設值分別為 200 與 70。

span.span: The default values for the width and height of the symbol are 200 and 70, respectively.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數列符號的大小會以圖例字型大小的百分比表示。The size of the series symbol is measured as a percentage of the legend font size. 屬性才適用如果屬性設定為。The property is only applicable if the property is set to .

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the legend cell text.

value.span: 值，表示圖例資料格的文字。

span.span: A value that represents the text for the legend cell.

value.span: 預設值為零長度字串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性才適用如果屬性設定為。The property is only applicable if the property is set to .

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格的工具提示文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip text for the legend cell.

value.span: 值，表示圖例資料格工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend cell.

value.span: 預設值為零長度字串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性設定為`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 預設值為 `true`。The default value is `true`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要以這種方式，建立影像地圖的屬性物件必須設為。To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 您可使用二進位資料流時，建立影像地圖，但必須使用另一種技術。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 如果`ToolTip`屬性設定的圖例項目和圖例資料格時，圖例資料格屬性的優先順序。If the `ToolTip` property is set for both a legend item and a legend cell, the legend cell property has precedence. 這屬性可讓您設定要顯示不同類型的圖表相關資料的特殊關鍵字。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要建立具有使用者定義的座標的影像對應，請使用屬性的根物件。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格的 URL 目標。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL target of the legend cell.

value.span: 值，表示圖表項目的目的 URL 或錨點。

span.span: A value that represents the destination URL or anchor point of the chart element.

value.span: 若要使用絕對 URL，字串運算式的開頭請使用 "http://" 或 "www."。

span.span: To use an absolute URL, start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.".

value.span: 如果字串的開頭不是上述其中一個前置詞，則會將字串視為相對 URL。

span.span: If the string does not start with either of these prefixes it will be treated as a relative URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定這個屬性時，將會自動建立用戶端影像地圖。If you set this property, a client-side image map will be automatically created. 對應區域也會建立以 Href 屬性設定為指定的錨點或 URL。A map area will also be created with its Href attribute set to the specified anchor or URL. 設定這個屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性設定為`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 預設值為 `true`。The default value is `true`. 屬性的對應區域中，例如，目標 = _blank，可以使用來自指定屬性。Attributes of the map area(s), for example, target=_blank, can be specified by using the property. 屬性可讓您設定要顯示不同類型的圖表相關資料的特殊關鍵字。The property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 關鍵字](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c)。For more information, see [Keywords](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c). 若要建立具有使用者定義的座標的影像對應，請使用屬性的根物件。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 圖表影像呈現](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505)。For more information, see [Chart Image Rendering](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505).
